name: duckdb-api
description: Cloudflare Worker for DuckDB Container API

scripts.dev: if [ -f wrangler.local.jsonc ]; then wrangler dev -c wrangler.local.jsonc; else echo 'Error: wrangler.local.jsonc not found. Run pnpm launch first.' && exit 1; fi
scripts.deploy: if [ -f wrangler.local.jsonc ]; then wrangler deploy -c wrangler.local.jsonc --containers-rollout=immediate; else echo 'Error: wrangler.local.jsonc not found. Run pnpm launch first.' && exit 1; fi
